explanation: [0-0] A white refrigerator filled with various drinks is placed in front of a beige wall.

[0-6] A man in a blue hoodie and gray jeans walks to the refrigerator, looks back, opens the refrigerator, takes out a drink in a green bottle, closes the refrigerator door with a smile, glances back, puts the drink in his pocket, and leaves.

[6-8] Then the scene cuts to a glass door. It is now nighttime, and a man in a yellow-green hoodie and matching pants is wearing a pair of black-framed glasses. He bends over and looks curiously at the glass door. Behind him are barrels of mineral water, bottled mineral water, and a parked electric car. He puts his hand on his chin and smiles, finally tilting his head to the left.
